name: 审计跟踪
description: An audit trail (also called audit log) is a security-relevant chronological record, set of records, and/or destination and source of records that provide documentary evidence of the sequence of activities that have affected at any time a specific operation, procedure, or event. Audit records typically result from activities such as financial transactions, scientific research and health care data transactions, or communications by individual people, systems, accounts, or other entities.

name: DDOS
description: DDoS, distributed denial of service, the intentional paralyzing of a computer network by flooding it with data sent simultaneously from many individual computers。
